text: Thanks, <@UQP1YFFBL> ! I write a bit for both! Our website is patient-focused so the majority of my writing is for them. I probably spend 20% of my time writing for referring doctors between different letters we send out and updates on different treatments and such. I enjoy healthcare content because I’ve learned a lot about the conditions our doctors specialize in treating and they really can help!
